title.rendered: PROFESSIONAL AIRCRAFT ACCESSORIES PENS EXCLUSIVE LANDING GEAR OVERHAUL AGREEMENT WITH PSA AIRLINES

content.rendered:
Professional Aircraft Accessories, a Greenwich AeroGroup company and PSA Airlines announced a five-year exclusive agreement for the landing gear overhaul and support of PSA Airlines’ Bombardier regional jets.

In 2012, Professional Aircraft Accessories began supporting PSA Airlines, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Airlines Group, with its Bombardier CRJ 200 requirements. This recent and exclusive agreement between the two companies will have Professional Aircraft Accessories supporting PSA’s fleet of 130 Bombardier CRJ 700 and CRJ 900 aircraft.

“We are honored and excited to continue to develop our relationship with PSA Airlines,” said Jonathan Clarke, vice president and general manager for Professional Aircraft Accessories. “Our values and passion for providing reliable products and outstanding customer service align closely with PSA’s overall focus on delivering operational reliability to their customers. These factors make a durable partnership.”

The exclusive landing gear overhaul agreement will run through December 2025.
